plain.description: Clone an object、array or anything else. (by build-in JSON)

deep.description: Clone an object、array or anything else. (by Reflect)

constructor.description: Create a queue with max length
constructor.example:
const { Queue } = require('lopo-lib')

const queue = new Queue(5)

create.description: create a queue with max length ( alias of 'new Queue(n)' )
create.example:
const { Queue } = require('lopo-lib')

const queue = Queue.create(5)  // as well as 'new Queue(5)'

getQueue.description: returns a shallow copy of current queue

in.description: push some items into the queue and return current length of the queue

out.description: take n items from the queue

circle.description: move the queue forward n positions, and the items dequeued at the head are re-queued in order
circle.declaration: public Queue<T>.circle(n: number, reverse: boolean = false): void

clear.description: clear the queue and reset its max-length to 'n' (if need)
